mapper.select: select rn, class_no, class_name, class_startdate, class_enddate, class_dayofweek, class_time, class_room, class_credit, class_type, a.pro_no, p.pro_name from (select rownum rn, class_no, class_name, class_startdate, class_enddate, class_dayofweek, class_time, class_room, class_credit, class_type, pro_no from (select * from class where ${option} like '%'||'${search}'||'%' order by class_type desc)) a, professor p where a.pro_no=p.pro_no and rn between #{start} and #{end} order by rn
select count(*) from class where ${option} like '%'||'${search}'||'%'

insert into class ( class_no, class_name, class_startdate, class_enddate, class_dayofweek, class_time, class_room, class_credit, class_type, pro_no ) values( #{class_no}, #{class_name}, #{class_startdate}, #{class_enddate}, #{class_dayofweek}, #{class_time}, #{class_room}, #{class_credit}, #{class_type}, #{pro_no} )

update class set class_no=#{class_no}, class_name=#{class_name}, class_startdate=#{class_startdate}, class_enddate=#{class_enddate}, class_dayofweek=#{class_dayofweek}, class_time=#{class_time}, class_room=#{class_room}, class_credit=#{class_credit}, class_type=#{class_type}, pro_no=#{pro_no} where class_no=#{class_no}
